name: Protein Ice Cream (Chocolate or Vanilla)
description: Our guilt-free Protein Ice Cream recipe is just 4 ingredients, no churn, no added sugar and is creamy and delicious in chocolate or vanilla.
instructions: Blend: Add all ingredients to a high powered blender or food processor and blend until smooth. (See notes for Ninja Creami Instructions). Freeze: Spoon into a freezer friendly container, cover, and freeze for at least 1-3 hours, or until frozen.  Scoop and enjoy!
